entrezGeneId.description: Entrez GeneId of gene where this mutation occurs.

geneSymbol.description: Symbol of gene where this mutation occurs.

genomeAssembly.description: Reference genome assembly used for coordinates in this record.

chromosome.description: Chromosome on which this gene is located.

chromosomeStartPosition.description: Start position on the chromosome of this mutation.

chromosomeEndPosition.description: End position on the chromosome of this mutation.

sampleId.description: Id of the sample from which this data point is derived.

experimentId.description: Id of the experiment from which this data point is derived.
